StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Single Molecule Molecular Inversion Probe Capture Developed Using the CIViC Database

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: We gratefully acknowledge Tim Ley for sharing genomic data that made this project possible. We also would like to thank the patients and their families for their selfless contribution to the advancement of science. EKB was supported by the National Cancer Institute (T32GM007200 and U01CA209936). Select sample data was funded by the Genomics of AML PPG (T. Ley, PI, P01 CA101937). RU was funded by the National Comprehensive Cancer Network Oncology Research Program, general research support provided by Novartis Pharmaceutical Corporation (Novartis), the V Foundation for Cancer Research, and the National Institute of Dental and Craniofacial Research (NIH NIDCR R01DE024403). RG is funded by the National Cancer Institute (NIH NCI U01CA231844). MG is funded by the V Foundation for Cancer Research and the National Human Genome Research Institute (NIH NHGRI R00HG007940). SJS is funded by the National Cancer Institute (NIH NCI R33CA222344). OLG is funded by the V Foundation for Cancer Research, and the National Cancer Institute (NIH NCI U01CA209936, NIH NCI U24CA237719 and NIH NCI U01CA231844). This research was supported by a Cancer Moonshot funding opportunity, specifically, an Activities to Promote Technology Research Collaborations (APTRC) for Cancer Research (Admin Supp) award to SJS and OLG under parent awards (NIH NCI R33CA222344 and NIH NCI U01CA209936).

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Lung Cancer, IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-LC-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Lung Cancer. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cancer.
